snippet: Organizers of the WTA Championships, which bounced around the globe after leaving Madison Square Garden, reached a five-year agreement with Singapore to host the event.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the WTA Championships, which bounced around the globe after leaving Madison Square Garden, reached a five-year agreement with Singapore to host the event.

headline.seo: WTA Championships Find Home in Singapore
headline.main: WTA Championships Find Home in Singapore
headline.print_headline: WTA Championships Find Home in Singapore
